7cfb0a83-3285-4b66-8209-486bc4430a09.description: Earners of the Unisys CloudForte® Foundation badge have a fundamental understanding of the components of CloudForte as a Unisys offering. They have entry-level knowledge of some of the key tools and services of CloudForte and should be capable of communicating the use and value of these.
7cfb0a83-3285-4b66-8209-486bc4430a09.name: Unisys CloudForte® Foundation

badge_template_activities.title: Earner must be a Unisys associate

Earner must successfully complete the CloudForte CMP Fundamentals - Featuring ServiceNow on-demand course
Earner must successfully complete the CloudForte Assure Overview on-demand course
Earner must successfully complete the Unisys Cloud Cost Optimization Fundamentals on-demand course

76c7e9e3-d455-4c47-a1a3-f2ba5003478a.description: Earners of the Unisys InteliServe™ Foundation badge have fundamental knowledge of the components of InteliServe™ as a Unisys offering. 9b58a6fa-c296-42b0-a3f0-56a7bd5e86cd.description: Individuals earning this badge demonstrate their advanced knowledge of DevSecOps which is the embodiment of security into the Agile software development process. Developers with this badge understand the various subjects of development in order to deliver secure products to our clients. Individuals must complete the series of training courses and successfully pass all integrated course exams. Contact UnisysBadging@unisys.com for further information.
9b58a6fa-c296-42b0-a3f0-56a7bd5e86cd.name: Unisys DevSecOps for Software Developers

cee893c7-4d46-4e9c-822a-126ec2f2470a.description: Individuals earning this badge demonstrate their advanced knowledge of DevSecOps which is the embodiment of security into the Agile software development process. Project owners with this badge understand the various subjects of project management to deliver secure products to our clients. Individuals must complete the series of training courses and successfully pass all integrated course exams. Contact UnisysBadging@unisys.com for further information.

93ca7e35-50de-415d-8c96-d47dfde69f50.description: Unisys Leaders who earn this badge have incorporated fundamental leadership practices to lift team performance and engagement. These practices include: connecting the work of the team to the organization's purpose, establishing team purpose and SMART goals, prioritizing and delegating, conducting one to one, providing regular positive and constructive feedback, and identifying performance trends.
93ca7e35-50de-415d-8c96-d47dfde69f50.name: Performance Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Must be Unisys Associate in a leadership role
Completion of course content over 8 weeks, including live sessions, assessments, and assignments
Participation in follow-through reinforcement sessions and assessments in 4 months post-program
Confirmation from participant's leader that the participant has incorporated  program practices

d499918d-f1fe-48cb-96ee-e1a9c0790784.description: You must be a Unisys associate to earn this badge. 63b26f45-c321-4d04-b628-22b5070e44d6.description: Any Unisys associate who holds, or has held, a patent granted by the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office, now or in the future, while an employee of Unisys, is eligible for this digital badge. This badge is issued only once to an individual, regardless of the number of patents he or she may have been granted and whether or not the patent was granted to the individual as a sole inventor or as a co-inventor. This digital badge is awarded to all eligible individuals on a quarterly basis.
63b26f45-c321-4d04-b628-22b5070e44d6.name: Unisys Inventor

c16ebb03-b30c-4a0a-8943-bd380e6a5dbd.description: Unisys Leaders who earn this badge have incorporated leadership practices that inspire teams to achieve success on strategic objectives. This includes: crafting a team vision and strategy and utilizing the 4 Disciplines of Execution to identify a wildly important goal, lead measures, a scoreboard, and a cadence of accountability.
c16ebb03-b30c-4a0a-8943-bd380e6a5dbd.name: Inspirational Leadership

fbd60670-6dbe-4f8a-ae42-68a417d626af.description: Throughout this Foundational Badge Program, you will learn how to build a compelling, data-driven story that adequately answers the framed problem and motivates action among key stakeholders. You will be able to realize the full potential of your data-driven decision-making process by putting data to work for you and evaluating how and what data can be optimized and ultimately measured to uncover hidden insights.
